original_title: Was bleibt | Šta ostaje | What Remains / Re-visited
overview: In 2008 and 2009, Clarissa Thieme travelled through Bosnia-Herzegovina, setting up her camera at places where war crimes took place during the nineties. Now she returns to the same locations a decade later: what traces are left behind by a violent past?
title: Was bleibt | Šta ostaje | What Remains / Re-visited
